price: Wala Sisi hatukuwadhulumu, bali wao ndio walio kuwa madhaalimu.
arabic: وَمَا ظَلَمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
footnotes: Wala Sisi hatukuwadhulumu wakosefu hawa kwa adhabu hii, lakini wao wenyewe ndio walio jidhulumu nafsi zao kwa kukhiari upotofu kuliko uwongofu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā ẓalamnāhum walākin kānū humu al-ẓālimīna
